attributes.action: Acknowledge and reward Ross Kemp for the documentary series "Ross Kemp in Afghanistan"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After watching the above documentary series "Ross Kemp in Afghanistan" I feel that Ross Kemp should be acknowledge and rewarded for his honest and realistic potrayal of soldiers experience in Afghanistan. The quality of journalism and realism within this documentary shows the professionalism of not only the British Army but the humility and respect that the british Army show to the peple of Afghanistan and the Soldiers who lost their lives in accomplishing this mission>

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
